blogPost.excerpt: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. 🗳️ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically 🃏 Interactive cards and custom estimation scales ⏰ Async friendly for distributed teams
blogPost.body: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. 🗳️ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically 🃏 Interactive cards and custom estimation scales ⏰ Async friendly for distributed teams
blogPost.title: Sprint Poker by Parabol - Remotely bring planning poker to life
blogPost.author: Jordan Husney

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一个直观的，轻量级的估算工具，适合你现有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自动同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定义估算尺度 ⏰ 对分布式团队的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 远程将规划扑克带入生活

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一個直觀的，輕量級的估算工具，適合你現有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自動同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定義估算尺度 ⏰ 對分佈式團隊的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 遠程將規劃撲克帶入生活

previous.excerpt: A free tool to help you find startup investors & manage your fundraising process. We help you to find the right person at the right firm. 🔍 Search 1000s of investors 💾 Save them to your FundBoard 🤝 Share them to get find introductions
previous.title: FundBoard - Build a tailor-fit list of startup investors in minutes

localize.description: 一个免费的工具，帮助你找到创业投资者和管理你的筹资过程。我们帮助您在合适的公司找到合适的人。🔍 搜索1000个投资人 💾 将他们保存到您的FundBoard 🤝 分享他们以获得寻找介绍的机会
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内建立一个量身定做的创业投资人名单。

localize.description: 一個免費的工具，幫助你找到創業投資者和管理你的籌資過程。我們幫助您在合適的公司找到合適的人。🔍 搜索1000個投資人 💾 將他們保存到您的FundBoard 🤝 分享他們以獲得尋找介紹的機會
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內建立一個量身定做的創業投資人名單。

next.excerpt: Who you follow is one of the most important aspects of the Clubhouse app. The Rooms that are shown to users are based on which people and Clubs you choose to follow. I compiled a list of 200 most influential people to follow on Clubhouse.
next.title: People of Clubhouse - Most influential people on Clubhouse

localize.description: 你关注谁是会所应用最重要的方面之一。显示给用户的房间是基于你选择关注的人和俱乐部。我整理了一份名单，列出了200个在Clubhouse上最有影响力的人。
你關注誰是會所應用最重要的方面之一。顯示給用戶的房間是基於你選擇關注的人和俱樂部。我整理了一份名單，列出了200個在Clubhouse上最有影響力的人。
